001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.net.MalformedURLException;
005import java.net.URI;
006import java.net.URL;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.util.Optional;
009
010import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
011import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
012import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringBuilder;
013
014public class ApiHttpRequest extends Base {
015
016    private ApiHttpMethod method;
017    private URI uri;
018    private ApiHttpHeaders headers;
019    private byte[] body;
020
021    public ApiHttpRequest() {
022    }
023
024    public ApiHttpRequest(final ApiHttpMethod method, final URI uri, final ApiHttpHeaders headers, final byte[] body) {
025        this.method = method;
026        this.uri = uri;
027        this.headers = headers;
028        this.body = body;
029    }
030
031    public ApiHttpRequest(final ApiHttpRequest r) {
032        this.method = r.method;
033        this.uri = r.uri;
034        this.headers = r.headers;
035        this.body = r.body;
036    }
037
038    public ApiHttpMethod getMethod() {
039        return method;
040    }
041
042    public ApiHttpRequest withMethod(final ApiHttpMethod method) {
043        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
044        request.method = method;
045
046        return request;
047    }
048
049    public ApiHttpHeaders getHeaders() {
050        if (headers == null) {
051            this.headers = new ApiHttpHeaders();
052        }
053        return headers;
054    }
055
056    public ApiHttpRequest addHeader(final String key, final String value) {
057        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
058        request.headers = getHeaders().addHeader(key, value);
059
060        return request;
061    }
062
063    public ApiHttpRequest withHeaders(final ApiHttpHeaders headers) {
064        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
065        request.headers = headers;
066        return request;
067    }
068
069    public ApiHttpRequest withHeader(final String key, final String value) {
070        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
071        request.headers = getHeaders().withHeader(key, value);
072
073        return request;
074    }
075
076    public ApiHttpRequest withoutHeader(final String key) {
077        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
078        request.headers = getHeaders().withoutHeader(key);
079
080        return request;
081    }
082
083    public byte[] getBody() {
084        return body;
085    }
086
087    public ApiHttpRequest withBody(final byte[] body) {
088        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
089        request.body = body;
090        return request;
091    }
092
093    public ApiHttpRequest withBody(final String body) {
094        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
095        if (body == null) {
096            request.body = null;
097        }
098        else {
099            request.body = body.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
100        }
101
102        return request;
103    }
104
105    public URI getUri() {
106        return uri;
107    }
108
109    public URL getUrl() {
110        try {
111            return uri.toURL();
112        }
113        catch (MalformedURLException e) {
114            throw new IllegalStateException("Malformed URI", e);
115        }
116    }
117
118    public ApiHttpRequest withUri(final String uri) {
119        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
120        request.uri = URI.create(uri);
121        return request;
122    }
123
124    public ApiHttpRequest withUri(final URI uri) {
125        ApiHttpRequest request = copy();
126        request.uri = uri;
127
128        return request;
129    }
130
131    public ApiHttpRequest resolve(final URI baseUri) {
132        return withUri(baseUri.resolve(this.uri));
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public String toString() {
137        return new ToStringBuilder(this).append("method", method)
138                .append("uri", "\"" + uri + "\"")
139                .append("headers", headers)
140                .append("textInterpretedBody", getSecuredBody())
141                .toString();
142    }
143
144    public String getSecuredBody() {
145        return Optional.ofNullable(body)
146                .map(b -> tryToFilter(new String(b, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)))
147                .orElse("empty body");
148    }
149
150    static String tryToFilter(final String input) {
151        return input.replaceAll("(\"\\w*([Pp]ass|access_token|refresh_token)\\w*\"):\"[^\"]*\"",
152            "$1:\"**removed from output**\"");
153    }
154
155    private ApiHttpRequest copy() {
156        return new ApiHttpRequest(this);
157    }
158
159    @Override
160    public boolean equals(Object o) {
161        if (this == o)
162            return true;
163
164        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
165            return false;
166
167        ApiHttpRequest request = (ApiHttpRequest) o;
168
169        return new EqualsBuilder().append(method, request.method)
170                .append(uri, request.uri)
171                .append(headers, request.headers)
172                .append(body, request.body)
173                .isEquals();
174    }
175
176    @Override
177    public int hashCode() {
178        return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(method).append(uri).append(headers).append(body).toHashCode();
179    }
180}
